ai-tha-ap157:0.3_0: the Elder Tissa took the Flame Tree flowers
ai-tha-ap157:1.3_0: by the Lord of the World,
ai-tha-ap157:2.2_0: Don’t let the Realized One know
ai-tha-ap157:2.3_0: when all people have come together,
ai-tha-ap157:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap157:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap157:4.2_0: King Okkāka, the lord of men,
ai-tha-ap157:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgārava.
ai-tha-ap157:7.1_0: The fifth Coral Tree of the Flowers (of the Three)
